text: Joseph Arthur Comte de Gobineau (July 14, 1816 — October 13, 1882) was a French aristocrat. He was well educated, and wrote many things. He became famous for developing the racialist theory of the Aryan Master race in his book An Essay on the Inequality of the Human Races (1853-1855). Category:1816 births Category:1882 deaths Category:Writers from Île-de-France Category:People from Hauts-de-Seine
title: Arthur de Gobineau
